original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 338/339 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka rupee at 338/339 to the US dollar on Friday up from 243/348 a day earlier in the spot market as the rupee continued to move up after a surrender rule was relaxed making more dollars available to the market.
On Friday a daily guidance peg was set at 346.17 to the US dollar, from 353.65 to the US dollar.
A trading band was set up 10 rupees from 7.5 rupee a day earlier.
Sri Lanka’s central bank tightened monetary policy and phased out money printing ending forex shortages, (Colombo/Mar01/2023)
